# My Agent

Design and build a mobile baseball video game inspired by the gameplay style and spirit of Backyard Baseball 2001, but fully original in art, code, characters, names, and audio to ensure no copyright or trademark infringement.

The goal is to capture the nostalgic feel — accessible gameplay, kid-friendly humor, colorful backyard settings, and easy-to-learn controls — while introducing new characters, stadiums, and mechanics.

Use unique intellectual property throughout, and emphasize replayability, intuitive controls, and cross-platform mobile optimization.
